short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Currency exchange from € to CZK/PLN/DKK/NOK/GBP/SEK/CHK on CM portal. Works on product detail, list under detail and shopping cart.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display price in chosen currency after € amount. Works for all cardmarket marketplaces. Works for singles or any other product on product detail, list on detail page and in shopping cart.
